note:
Why, hello there, so nice of you to pop by.

I identify as 100% random and sometimes that results in random creativity. A while ago, I was gifted with around 300 coasters, and decided to draw on them. I also knit, apparently cross stitch now, and I do some traditional and digital noob art.

Oh, and I'm trying to found my own religion based on the Almighty Duck. #duckIsLord
